title: How Slack Transformed Cron into a Distributed Job Scheduler
author: Joab Jackson
description: With help from Kubernetes, Golang and Kafka, Slack's crontab drives 2,000 tasks an hour. Monster Scale Summit had all the details.
cntitle: Slack 如何将 Cron 转换为分布式作业调度程序
cndescription: 在 Kubernetes、Golang 和 Kafka 的帮助下，Slack 的 crontab 每小时驱动 2,000 个任务。Monster Scale Summit 包含了所有详细信息。
